General.Name: Nixu Oyj
General.Description: Nixu Oyj operates as a cybersecurity services company in Finland, Sweden, Denmark, Benelux, Norway, and internationally. The company offers services in the areas of business digitalization, cyber defense, cybersecurity outsourcing, security engineering, digital identity, cybersecurity exercises and training, IoT, cloud transformation, compliance and certification, and connected devices, as well as cloud security, safety, and reliability. It provides services and sells licenses to business enterprises and the public sector. Nixu Oyj was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

0.Name: Mr. Janne  Kärkkäinen
0.Title: CFO, Deputy CEO & Sec. of the Board
